definition: made of grain or relating to grain or the plants that produce it, a breakfast food prepared from grain
details:
adjective
- made of grain or relating to grain or the plants that produce it
= example: made of grain or relating to grain or the plants that produce it
noun
- a breakfast food prepared from grain
- foodstuff prepared from the starchy grains of cereal grasses
= synonyms: grain, food grain
- grass whose starchy grains are used as food: wheat
= synonyms: cereal grass
